name: Lucrativo Ltd Sustainable Solutions
membership: Circular Economy Club, Baltic Sea Action Group, Finnish Natural Heritage Foundation
goal:
We offer legal, reporting, project, and design services for CSR (corporate responsibility) and environmental issues. We act by GRI reporting and with SimaPro system for environmental Life Cycle Analysis.

Lucrativo Sustainability Solutions analyses, develops and produces sustainability solutions.

Within the development project supported by Business Finland the solutions were tested and finalised with pilot customers during the Spring 2018. The solutions are divided into three main sections: international CSR reporting, sustainable product design and sustainable concepts. The end products, although also depending on the customer's requests, are e.g. completed CSR reporting system, involving specified environmental policy, carbon footprint, LCA (life cycle analysis) as well as new design as a new sustainable product.
